author: tendencias 1
title: Eva Luna en polémica tras revelar que no tuvo ginecólogo durante embarazo: “Fue completamente un acto de fe” | Vanguardia.com
text: Eva Luna Montaner y Camilo, quienes se casaron el 8 de febrero de 2020, dieron la bienvenida a su hija Índigo el 6 de abril, dos años después de su matrimonio. La pareja compartió que el nacimiento de Índigo fue un parto natural en agua, asistido por una partera. Interesantemente, no sabían el sexo del bebé antes del nacimiento, eligiendo el nombre “Índigo” por su neutralidad de género. Recientemente, Eva Luna reveló en el podcast “Pensándolo bien, pensábamos mal” que durante su embarazo no consultó a ningún especialista médico. “No tuve ginecólogo. No me realizaron ultrasonidos ni ecografías”, comentó Montaner, añadiendo que su embarazo fue un “acto de fe” y que solo utilizó un estetoscopio para escuchar el corazón del bebé. La cantante y actriz expresó que su principal temor no fue durante el embarazo, sino en la crianza y educación de su hija tras su nacimiento. “Mi mayor miedo era: ‘voy a ser mamá, ¿cómo la criaré desde cero? Claro que tenía miedo’”, confesó. Lea también: Carolina Cruz aclara rumores sobre ruptura con Jamil Farah Estas declaraciones han generado opiniones divididas en internet. Algunos cibernautas critican su decisión por considerarla un riesgo tanto para ella como para su bebé, mientras que otros apoyan su enfoque de la maternidad. Además, no es la primera vez que Eva Luna genera polémica. Anteriormente fue objeto de críticas por amamantar a su hija hasta un año y medio después de su nacimiento, una decisión sobre la cual ha evitado entrar en debate con sus críticos. Información de: Resumen Agencias.

author: time news
title: Satya’s New Year Sale: Huge Discounts on LG and Samsung TVs, Combo Gifts, and Special Offers on Home Appliances
text:
2023-12-28 21:36:00
Shop more and save more at Satya’s New Year Sale
If you’ve been eyeing a new TV or home appliance, now is the time to make your purchase at Satya’s New Year Sale. With huge discounts and cashback offers, you can shop to your heart’s content and still save big.
One of the biggest draws of the sale is the discounts on LG OLED TVs. Not only are the TVs themselves on sale, but there’s also a special combo gift offer. Purchase an LG OLED TV and receive premium brand ear buds worth Rs 12,990 for only Rs 1,499. That’s a steal for a high-quality accessory.
But LG isn’t the only brand offering great deals. Samsung is also in on the action, with a special offer on their 75 inch Ultra HD TV. Purchase this TV and get Sony Ear Buds worth Rs 8,990 for only Rs 3,999. It’s a fantastic way to enhance your viewing experience with top-notch audio.
Home appliances are also a part of the sale, with special discounts and combo gifts available. Purchase a Front Load Washing Machine and get a 3 Liter Instant Water Heater as a combo gift. Or opt for a Godrej Top Load Washing Machine and receive a Mixi as a gift. It’s a great way to upgrade your home without breaking the bank.
In addition to these great offers, there are easy installment options available for those who prefer to spread out their payments. And don’t forget about the cashback offer, which can help you save even more on your purchase.
If you’re ready to take advantage of these amazing deals, head to Satya’s New Year Sale at one of their locations in RS Puram, 100 Feet Road, Oppanakkara Road, Goundampalayam, Singhanallur, or Sulur. You can also give them a call at 98403 68985 or 98401 56985 for more information.
Don’t miss out on the chance to shop more and save more at Satya’s New Year Sale. With these unbeatable offers, there’s never been a better time to upgrade your home entertainment and appliances.

author: Nimrah Khatoon
title: Revolutionary Concrete-Charcoal Composite Offers Sustainable Energy Storage Solution
text:
In a groundbreaking development that could redefine the way we store and utilize renewable energy, researchers at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) have unveiled a novel approach that ingeniously combines the robustness of concrete with the energy-storing capabilities of charcoal. This discovery not only promises a more sustainable future but also paves the way for innovative applications, such as powering homes with renewable energy sources and even charging electric vehicles on the move. This revelation, made on February 16, 2024, hints at a future where our very infrastructure could double as a colossal energy storage system.
A Convergence of Concrete and Energy Storage
The MIT team's research has led to the creation of a three-dimensional reinforced concrete-like composite solid electrolyte that exhibits remarkable properties. This composite is not only akin to concrete in its structural integrity but also acts as a supercapacitor, capable of fast ion transport, high ion conductivity, and excellent electrochemical stability. The key to this innovation lies in the incorporation of charcoal into the concrete mix. As the concrete hardens, the carbon from the charcoal forms a network of conductive paths, enabling the composite to charge and discharge efficiently over 10,000 cycles. This feature, combined with its promising cycle stability and rate performance, offers a practical strategy for the commercial development of renewable energy storage solutions.
Revolutionizing Renewable Energy Storage
The implications of this research are vast and varied. For homeowners, the prospect of storing energy generated from solar panels or wind turbines directly within the walls of their homes could become a reality. This not only addresses the challenge of power fluctuations associated with renewable energy sources but also promotes a more self-sufficient and sustainable living model. Furthermore, the development of energy-storing concrete roads could revolutionize the electric vehicle (EV) industry by providing a continuous charging solution, thereby extending the range of EVs and reducing "range anxiety" among users.
Challenges and Future Prospects
Despite the promising potential of this technology, the path to widespread adoption is fraught with challenges. The implementation of such an energy storage system would necessitate significant changes in architecture, roadworks, and maintenance protocols. A conductive salt solution is required to carry the electrical charge through the design, raising questions about the long-term viability and environmental impact of such a system. Nonetheless, the use of cheap and readily available materials like concrete and charcoal for energy storage presents a compelling case for further research and development in this field.
In conclusion, the pioneering work by MIT researchers on integrating energy storage capabilities into concrete opens up new horizons for renewable energy storage and utilization. While there are hurdles to overcome, the potential benefits of creating an infrastructure that not only supports our daily lives but also serves as a massive energy storage system are too significant to ignore. As we move forward, the focus will undoubtedly remain on refining this technology to meet the practical and environmental challenges that lie ahead, with the ultimate goal of achieving a more sustainable and energy-efficient future.

organizations.name: concrete and energy storage the mit

title: हल्द्वानी में दर्दनाक हादसाः व्यक्ति को यूं खींच ले गई मौत, परिवार में पसरा मातम
text:
3 weeks ago

हरियाणा
Edited By Vandana Khosla, Updated: 17 Jul, 2025 08:19 AM
नैनीतालः उत्तराखंड के हल्द्वानी में बुधवार को बरेली राजमार्ग पर एक ट्रक की चपेट में आने से एक व्यक्ति की मौत हो गई। जबकि पत्नी और दो बच्चे घायल हो गए।
नैनीतालः उत्तराखंड के हल्द्वानी में बुधवार को बरेली राजमार्ग पर एक ट्रक की चपेट में आने से एक व्यक्ति की मौत हो गई। जबकि पत्नी और दो बच्चे घायल हो गए। प्राप्त जानकारी के अनुसार हल्द्वानी के गौलापार बागजाला निवासी कन्नू बिष्ट अपनी पत्नी और दो बच्चों के साथ स्कूटी पर सवार होकर रिश्तेदारी में हरेला त्योहार मनाने के लिए ऊधमसिंह नगर के किच्छा जा रहा था। इसी दौरान बरेली राजमार्ग पर गोरापड़ाव के पास उनकी स्कूटी को एक ट्रक संख्या यूके 04 सीबी 8022 ने अपनी चपेट में ले लिया। जिससे कन्नू बिष्ट की मौके पर मौत हो गई। जबकि अन्य तीनों घायल हो गए। सूचना पर पहुंची पुलिस टीम ने शव को कब्जे में ले लिया और पोस्टमार्टम के लिए भेज दिया है। घायलों को डॉ. सुशीला तिवारी अस्पताल ले जाया गया है। पुलिस ने ट्रक को कब्जे में ले लिया है। चालक फरार होने में कामयाब रहा।
